message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

In accounting terminology, this refers to depreciation expense, which is the method of allocating the cost of a tangible or physical asset over its useful life.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a specific line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 132,103.78 on 2024-02-01.

This is the line item I'm looking for, as it represents the accumulated systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives for this accounting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '132103.78'}}
```
